lines.text: I'm gonna give you twenty-four hours to get out of this county. That means you have, oh, until two-fifteen tomorrow afternoon. If I see you around here after that, I won't hesitate to shoot you on sight. You got any questions?
I first met Ezra Pound on May 29th, 1945. I asked him once, how he was doing. He said, "The ant's a centaur in his dragon world. Pull down thy vanity..."
I'm telling you, Benno and Marco, they're like The Godfather, Part Two. It's like those guys are the original cast, and Jimmy the Cap and his boys are a road company.
Do you know what you're talking about? Because if you do, let me in on it.
